item.title: 巴拿马穆利诺表示，任何矿业谈判都将使用新机制
item.description: 巴拿马当选总统表示，他没有关于在这个中美洲国家重开一个巨型铜矿的建议，只是说未来的任何运营模式都不会使用之前签署的那种 "充满违宪问题 "的合同。【原文：Panama’s president-elect said he has no proposal for reopening a giant copper mine in the Central American country, saying only that any future operating model wouldn’t use the type of contract that was previously signed and was “plagued with unconstitutionalities.”】

item.title: 德玛莱的 Power Sustainable 放弃中国股票策略
item.description: 由蒙特利尔亿万富翁德斯马莱斯家族控制的专注于气候问题的公司 Power Sustainable 将关闭其在中国的投资管理业务，并结束其在中国的公共股票战略。【原文：Power Sustainable, a climate-focused firm that’s controlled by Montreal’s billionaire Desmarais family, is shutting its investment management operations in China and winding down its public equities strategy in the country.】

item.title: FCA 称公司内幕警报三年未开启
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）在其最新的市场通讯中向企业发出了新的警告— 请务必打开新闻。【原文：The Financial Conduct Authority had a new warning for firms in its latest market newsletter — make sure to turn on the news.】

item.title: 据称土耳其计划采取新财政措施应对 70% 的通胀率
item.description: 据知情人士透露，土耳其官员准备最早于周一宣布一系列削减公共开支的财政措施，以支持抗击猖獗的通货膨胀。【原文：Turkish officials are readying to announce a series of fiscal measures as early as Monday to cut public spending in a bid to support the fight against rampant inflation, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 空头获利 31%，Grifols 绊倒埃利奥特分拆计划
item.description: General Industrial Partners 对西班牙公司 Grifols SA 的空头押注广为人知，帮助该对冲基金获得了两位数的收益，而对同一只股票的看涨押注则导致 Elliott Management 前交易员 Franck Tuil 蒙受损失。【原文：A well-publicized short bet by General Industrial Partners on Spanish company Grifols SA helped the hedge fund earn double-digit gains while bullish wagers on the same stock caused losses to former Elliott Management trader Franck Tuil.】

item.title: 思杰母公司希望通过重新定价节省 41 亿美元贷款
item.description: 思杰系统公司（Citrix Systems Inc. 的母公司云软件集团公司（Cloud Software Group Inc.【原文：Citrix Systems Inc. parent Cloud Software Group Inc. is poised to save millions of dollars in annual interest costs from its planned $4.1 billion repricing of a leveraged loan.】

item.title: 加拿大央行称家庭可承受更高利率
item.description: 加拿大央行表示，家庭可以承受较高的借贷成本，但指出资产估值和租房者偿债能力的上升是金融前景面临的风险。【原文：The Bank of Canada says households can weather higher borrowing costs, but flagged rising asset valuations and debt serviceability among renters as risks to the financial outlook.】

item.title: 波兰保持利率稳定，担心通胀可能反弹
item.description: 波兰中央银行连续第七个月维持利率不变，因为尽管波兰经济复苏迄今为止仍然乏力，但人们仍然担心今年晚些时候会爆发通货膨胀。【原文：Poland’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged for a seventh straight month as concerns persist that inflation will flare up later this year despite a so-far sluggish economic recovery.】

item.title: 普华永道在加拿大裁员约 60 人，为经济放缓做准备
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，全球会计师事务所普华永道在加拿大裁员 60 人，以应对该国经济放缓带来的影响。【原文：PricewaterhouseCoopers, the global accounting firm, eliminated 60 jobs in Canada as the company braces for the fallout from the nation’s economic slowdown, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 瑞银进一步推迟提交对 AT1 剔除案的回应
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的代表律师成功地争取到了进一步推迟提交与去年瑞信 170 亿美元附加一级债券化为乌有时投资者提起的诉讼有关的意见的时间。【原文：Lawyers representing UBS Group AG have managed to win a further delay in submitting comments related to a case brought by investors burned when $17 billion of Credit Suisse Additional Tier 1 bonds were wiped out last year.】

item.title: 加纳塞地兑美元汇率历史性下跌
item.description: 加纳的塞地正处于创纪录的疲软周期。【原文：Ghana’s cedi is in a record-breaking weakening cycle.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称欧洲央行不会承诺在 6 月后采取任何路径
item.description: 欧洲央行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，欧洲央行不会承诺在 6 月降息计划之后会发生什么。【原文：The European Central Bank won’t commit to what will happen beyond its planned June rate cut, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 意大利银行在调查中暂停分红后 BFF 下跌
item.description: 在意大利银行因调查意大利专业金融公司而下令暂时停止 "利润分配 "和海外扩张后，BFF Bank SpA 的股价创下两年来最大跌幅。【原文：BFF Bank SpA plunged the most in two years after the Bank of Italy ordered a temporary halt on “profit distribution” and expansion abroad as a result of a probe into the Italian specialty finance company.】

item.title: 墨西哥消费者物价在利率决定前升幅超预期
item.description: 墨西哥上个月的总体通胀率略高于预期，这可能会巩固央行在周四晚些时候召开的货币政策会议上维持利率不变的立场。【原文：Mexico’s headline inflation sped up slightly more than expected last month, likely cementing a rate hold at the central bank’s monetary policy meeting later on Thursday.】

item.title: 贝索斯、扎克伯格领衔七大内幕人士抛售股票事件
item.description: 七大科技公司的内部人士正在追随杰夫-贝索斯和马克-扎克伯格，从这些在很大程度上推动了美国股市繁荣的股票中获取收益。【原文：Insiders at the Magnificent Seven tech companies are following Jeff Bezos and Mark Zuckerberg in realizing gains from the stocks that have largely powered the boom in US equity markets.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳誓言保护必和必拓与安格鲁潜在交易中的利益
item.description: 如果必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.）收购英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc），博茨瓦纳总统莫克韦齐-马西西（Mokgweetsi Masisi）誓言保护本国利益，包括其在钻石巨头戴比尔斯公司（De Beers）15%的股份。【原文：Botswana President Mokgweetsi Masisi vowed to protect the country’s interests, including its 15% stake in diamond giant De Beers, should BHP Group Ltd. acquire Anglo American Plc.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷在日内瓦被格鲁吉亚大亨起诉索赔 2.2 亿美元
item.description: 格鲁吉亚亿万富翁比季纳-伊万尼什维利（Bidzina Ivanishvili）就瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse）的 "流氓交易员 "丑闻起诉瑞士信贷集团，索赔2亿瑞士法郎（约合2.2亿美元）。【原文：Georgian billionaire Bidzina Ivanishvili sued Credit Suisse for 200 million Swiss francs ($220 million) Geneva over a rogue trader scandal, in a suit that goes beyond the $1.34 billion he’s already been awarded by courts in Bermuda and Singapore.】

item.title: 英国 ISA 每年可向萎靡不振的股市注入 40 亿英镑资金
item.description: Peel Hunt Ltd.的分析显示，政府提出的投资英国公司的免税储蓄账户建议每年可为股市增加 40 亿英镑（50 亿美元）的资金，有助于抵消创纪录的资金外流。【原文：The government’s proposal for a tax-free savings account for investing in UK companies could pump an additional £4 billion ($5 billion) a year into the stock market, helping to counter record outflows, according to an analysis by Peel Hunt Ltd.】

item.title: 美联储令市场陷入困境，顶级债券预测者意见分歧
item.description: 安舒尔-普拉丹（Anshul Pradhan）和斯蒂芬-斯坦利（Stephen Stanley）都预见到了当前美国债券市场的到来。只是他们对市场走向的看法并不一致。【原文：Anshul Pradhan and Stephen Stanley both saw the current US bond market coming. They just don’t agree on where it’s going.】

item.title: 72 小时内完成 88 笔交易，企业发债速度快得令人咋舌
item.description: 在全球信贷市场，几乎什么都可以做。【原文：In credit markets worldwide, almost anything goes.】

item.title: 什么是黄金签证？在哪里还能获得黄金签证？
item.description: 如果另一个国家的政府不希望你去那里，那么试图到达那里就会变得前所未有的困难和危险。2023 年，移民在寻找新生活的过程中丧生的人数创下了历史新高，而当时各国政府在边境执法方面的花费也创下了历史新高。【原文：It’s never been so difficult or dangerous to try to reach another country if its government doesn’t want you there. A record number of migrants died in their search for a new life in 2023, when governments spent record sums on border enforcement.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德公司首席执行官弗拉特认为交易正在增加，利润上升
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德公司公布的可分配利润增长了 5%，超过了分析师的预期，原因是其保险业务利润的增长帮助抵消了布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）的疲软。【原文：Brookfield Corp. posted a 5% increase in distributable earnings, beating analysts’ estimates, as higher profits in its insurance business helped offset a soft patch for Brookfield Asset Management.】

item.title: 拉姆斯登加入宽松阵营，英国央行更接近降息
item.description: 在第二位决策者投票支持降低借贷成本后，英格兰银行距离将利率从 16 年高点下调的目标越来越近，行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，他 "对事情正朝着正确的方向发展感到乐观"。【原文：The Bank of England edged closer to cutting interest rates from a 16-year high after a second policymaker voted for lower borrowing costs and Governor Andrew Bailey said he was “optimistic that things are moving in the right direction.”】

item.title: 3 万亿美元资产堆带来的负担引发了对 IPO 替代方案的探索
item.description: 随着首次公开募股市场在经历了两年的沉寂后反弹，苦苦等待回报的投资者终于得到了一些回报。【原文：As the market for initial public offerings bounces back after two lifeless years, investors who’ve been impatiently waiting for their payoff are finally getting some returns.】

item.title: 前高盛银行家因涉嫌在加纳行贿而被引渡
item.description: 一名前高盛集团银行家对英国将其引渡到美国的决定提出上诉，他在美国面临着在为该投资银行工作时贿赂加纳官员的指控。【原文：An ex-Goldman Sachs Group Inc. banker appealed a UK decision to extradite him to the US where he faces accusations of bribing Ghanaian officials when he worked for the investment bank.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。随着财报季的结束，欧洲股市纷纷走低，股票期货也随之走低。同时，市场在等待降息的进一步信号，英国央行今天的会议近在眼前。以下是您需要了解的其他信息 -- Morwenna Coniam【原文：Good morning. Stock futures are following European shares lower amid a spattering of lackluster outlooks as earnings season winds up. item.title: 阿提哈德航空季度利润创纪录，有望首次公开募股
item.description: 阿联酋国家航空公司阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways PJSC）报告称，在旅游需求激增的情况下，该公司 2024 年第一季度的利润创下了 "历史新高"，该公司正在为可能的首次公开募股做准备。【原文：Etihad Airways PJSC reported a “record” profit in the first quarter of 2024 amid surging demand for travel, as the United Arab Emirates’s national airline prepares for a possible initial public offering.】

item.title: 越南在泄密调查中拘留外交部官员
item.description: 劳动部一名被视为主张工会应具有一定独立性的高级官员因涉嫌故意泄露国家机密而被拘留。【原文：A senior labor ministry official seen as advocating for some independence of trade unions has been detained over allegations of deliberately disclosing state secrets.】
